name: Open Hatch
description: Dedicated to matching prospective free software contributors with communities, tools, and education

name: IDAT
description: IDAT is a daily dose of awesome things made by Queer, Trans, Non-Binary folks who are Black or Non-Black People Of Color! You'll be able to Amplify their work, Celebrate their achievement, and support them financially or any way they see fit.

name: Write Speak Code
description: On a mission to empower women software developers to become thought leaders, conference speakers, and open source contributors. We run conferences and events across the US.
